comment.author: 22694125@N02
comment._content: Congratulations! This is a wonderful shot! You are invited to post it to: artland

comment.author: 62379908@N00
comment._content: I believe the car is a 1934 Dodge.  I noticed the hood ornament and the hubcap appears to say "Dodge."   I notice that the doors are hinged at the rear.  I think they call these "suicide doors" because if you fall out of a moving car, the  door is more likely to cause you to land underneath the car.
